title: Configure - DockerImage
description: Edit the configuration of your DockerImage step

command.description: the command that is going to be executed once the container is up and running

imageId.description: the docker image identifier to be used from the local repository (like: mine/wflow:latest)

workdir.description: set the absolute path of the execution directory inside the container - if not set, the system will generate a temporary directory, place all the inputs there and call the command
